long_description: Convert your Thule Chariot Stroller into a deluxe bicycle trailer with the Thule Stroller Bike Trailer Kit. Patented ezHitch(R) makes for fast and easy installation. Industry approved safety features. Kit includes: lightweight aluminum hitch arm, axle mount ezHitch to attach to bicycle, quick-release skewer, hitch cup, safety flag, reflector kit and backup strap. Compatible with all Thule Chariot Strollers except Chinook 1 and Chinook 2, sold separately.
short_description: Convert your Thule Chariot Stroller into a deluxe bicycle trailer with the Thule Stroller Bike Trailer Kit.
